description: More markets for the Liga MX game, scheduled for March 4 at 10:00 PM ET.

markets.description:
In the upcoming Liga MX game, scheduled for March 4 at 10:00 PM ET:

This market will resolve to "Club Tijuana" if Club Tijuana win the game by 2 or more goals.

Otherwise, this market will resolve to "Atlas FC".

If the game is postponed, this market will remain open until the game has been completed. If the game is canceled entirely, with no make-up game, this market will resolve 50–50.

This market will resolve according to the official final score published on ligamx.net. This market refers only to the outcome within the first 90 minutes of regular play plus stoppage time.

The primary resolution source for this market is the official statistics of the event as recognized by the governing body or event organizers. However, if the governing body or event organizers have not published final match statistics within 2 hours after the event's conclusion, a consensus of credible reporting may be used instead.
markets.question: Spread: Club Tijuana (-1.5)

markets.description:
In the upcoming Liga MX game between Atlas FC and Club Tijuana, scheduled for March 4 at 10:00 PM ET:

This market will resolve to "Over" if Atlas FC and Club Tijuana combine to score 2 or more goals in this game.

If the combined total is less than 2, this market will resolve to "Under".

If the game is postponed, this market will remain open until the game has been completed. If the game is canceled entirely, with no make-up game, this market will resolve 50–50.

If the game is started but not completed, this market will resolve according to the official final score published on ligamx.net. This market refers only to the outcome within the first 90 minutes of regular play plus stoppage time.

The primary resolution source for this market is the official statistics of the event as recognized by the governing body or event organizers. However, if the governing body or event organizers have not published final match statistics within 2 hours after the event's conclusion, a consensus of credible reporting may be used instead.
markets.question: Atlas FC vs. Club Tijuana: O/U 1.5

markets.description:
In the upcoming Liga MX game between Atlas FC and Club Tijuana, scheduled for March 4 at 10:00 PM ET:

This market will resolve to "Yes" if both Atlas FC and Club Tijuana each score at least one goal during the game.

This market will resolve to "No" if either team fails to score (i.e., if one or both teams finish with zero goals).

If the game is postponed, this market will remain open until the game has been completed. If the game is canceled entirely, with no make-up game, this market will resolve 50–50.

If the game is started but not completed, this market will resolve according to the official final score published on ligamx.net. This market refers only to the outcome within the first 90 minutes of regular play plus stoppage time.

The primary resolution source for this market is the official statistics of the event as recognized by the governing body or event organizers. However, if the governing body or event organizers have not published final match statistics within 2 hours after the event's conclusion, a consensus of credible reporting may be used instead.
